vsParam: Varerian

Oh, [px] and Peppermint!
Perfect timing, I am going to look for you.
Peppermint

Huh? Looking for us?
Are you running out of materials in your shop?
Varerian

No, it's something else.
I want to tell father about my dream.
Peppermint

Ah, you want to tell that to Scalcap?
Why don't you just say it directly?
Varerian

Hey! I, it's not that easy!
I owe him my life! You know that, right?
Varerian

I haven't repaid his love and kindness,
Should I... go talk about some other dream with him?
Varerian

So I want to make a meal for father,
a meal that could make him feel my determination in cuisines...
Peppermint

But you are unsure, so you want us to go with you...
I didn't realize that you are so timid, Varerian.
Varerian

I, it's none of your business! This is important to me!
What! Please help me!
Of course we'll go with you.
What cuisines do you have in mind?
Varerian

Appreciate that!
You are great-hearted, [px]!
Varerian

I can't tell you now. But you'll find out when you go there.
Hee hee, I'll prepare enough for you.
Peppermint

We're good as long as [px]'s okay with it.
I'll tell Sorel and the guys.
Varerian

Okay, thank you.
Let's get prepared and go!
